name: Thai-Style Dipping Sauce
description: To make this amazing dipping sauce for dumplings, we start with the classic combination of Asian fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar, then punch it up with raw garlic, fresh cilantro, and hot chili flakes. The flavors blend seamlessly into a sauce that's versatile enough to dress a salad, marinate a steak, and, yes, coat your dumplings.
recipeIngredient: 8 teaspoons finely minced garlic (about 8 medium cloves)
4 tablespoons fresh juice from about 4 limes
2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh cilantro leaves and fine stems

recipeInstructions.text: Combine garlic, fish sauce, lime juice, brown sugar, cilanto, and chili flakes in a small bowl and stir until sugar is dissolved. Serve.
